summary: Carlo Antonelli, an engineer from Genoa, gets mugged and decides to take justice into his own hands. At first the muggers seem to get the upper hand, but then he's helped by Tommy, a young robber who takes his side.
cast: Franco Nero|Giancarlo Prete|Barbara Bach|Renzo Palmer|Nazzareno Zamperla|Massimo Vanni|Romano Puppo|Renata Zamengo|Franco Borelli|Mauro Vestri|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Adriana Facchetti|Angelo Casadei|Enzo G. Castellari|Silvio Klein|Mickey Knox|Rocco Lerro|Marne Maitland|Dino Mattielli|Riccardo Petrazzi|Renzo Pevarello|Leonardo Scavino|Sergio Soldano|Steffen Zacharias
title: El ciudadano se rebela
